summary: Created all 13 files for spec 05: WalletContext with useReducer + NWCClient ref, 8 hooks (useWallet, useWalletActions, useNWCClient, useBalance, useInvoice, usePayment, useBudget, useFiatRate), hooks barrel index, and 3 wallet components (WalletCard, WalletConnect, BalanceDisplay). All match spec exactly.
decisions: hooks/index.ts only exports hooks that exist now, future hooks commented out
NWCClient stored in useRef per spec (not serializable)
useBudget uses Nip47GetBudgetResponse from SDK types
Wallet components missing data-testid attributes (reviewer should flag)
